desc: Famous for her striking colour combinations and timeless, wearable designs, Kiki McDonough has become one of the most desirable British fine jewellery brands.

layout.text: Introducing our beautiful new Trilogy Rings, each Ring is rich with colour and exquisite detail. Standing the test of time, these distinctive Rings come in an array of compelling colours, such as the dreamy tones of Blue Topaz, and the dazzling reds of Fire Opal, all set in 18ct Yellow Gold.
